source.23937639:
trace2 = go.Line(
    x=data.sort_values(['Social support'],ascending=False)['Country (region)'][:30],
    y=data.sort_values(['Social support'],ascending=False)['Social support'][:30],
    name='Social Support'
)



d = [trace2]
layout = go.Layout(
    barmode='group'
)

fig = go.Figure(data=d, layout=layout)
iplot(fig)
